TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlServices extends System.Object
public ref class XamlServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供更高層級的服務 (靜態方法) 來用於一般 XAML 工作，包括讀取 XAML 和寫入物件圖形，或是讀取物件圖形和寫入 XAML 檔案輸出以進行序列化。

span.span: Provides higher-level services (static methods) for the common XAML tasks of reading XAML and writing an object graph; or reading an object graph and writing XAML file output for serialization purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模式中最常見的 XAML 讀取和寫入案例依賴建立 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器的執行個體所使用的類別。The modes of the class that are used in the most common XAML reading and writing scenarios rely on creating instances of XAML readers and XAML writers. 這些讀取器和寫入都是特製化，但內部實作的公用類別，例如， ，和。These readers and writers are specialized but internal implementations of public classes, such as , , and . 若要使用大部分的情況下，您可以依賴預設內部實作，以取得您想要的結果。To use for most scenarios, you can rely on the default internal implementations to obtain the results that you want. 您可以更具特製化的情況下，讀取器和寫入自己定義，並再將它們傳遞為引數的多載方法。For more specialized scenarios, you might define readers and writers yourself, and then pass them as arguments for overloads of the methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建議的 XAML 讀取或 XAML 撰寫的 API 集，如果您正在處理 WPF 定義的型別或 WPF 為基礎的類型。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing WPF-defined types, or types based on WPF. 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用方式，使用讀取或中載入 XAML （BAML）; 以及以寫入回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML (or BAML); and for writing back XAML. 這些類別的.NET Framework XAML 服務 Api 的 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器在內部使用它們的實作;不過，它們也提供支援和特製化的 XAML 結構描述內容的 WPF 特有的概念，例如相依性屬性和已知型別的 WPF 的最佳化。These classes use .NET Framework XAML Services APIs and the XAML readers and XAML writers internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support and specialized XAML schema context for WPF-specific concepts, such as optimizations for dependency properties and WPF known types.

summary.span: 載入 XAML 讀取器的來源，並寫入其輸出做為物件圖形。

span.span: Loads source for a XAML reader and writes its output as an object graph.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Load (System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public static hidebysig object Load(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
public: static System::Object ^ Load(System::IO::Stream ^ stream);
static member Load : System.IO.Stream -> obj

param.name: stream
param.span: 要載入做為輸入的資料流。

span.span: The stream to load as input.

summary.span: 載入 XAML 讀取器的 來源，並寫入其輸出做為物件圖形。

span.span: Loads a source for a XAML reader and writes its output as an object graph.

returns.span: 已做為輸出寫入的物件圖形。

span.span: The object graph that is written as output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對不同的簽章方法指定不同類型的來源 XAML 輸入。Different signatures for the method specify different types of input for the source XAML. 內部的實作會先建立藉由呼叫，然後建立特殊的新執行個體，處理輸入。The internal implementation first creates an by calling and then creates a new instance of a specialized that processes the input. 為了讓呼叫已成功建立物件圖形時，下列必須為真：In order for the call to successfully create an object graph, the following must be true: - 來源是語式正確且有效的 XML。The source is well-formed and valid XML. - 來源是有效的 XAML 語言層級。The source is valid XAML at the language level. - 在來源中指定的 XAML 型別 XAML 必須解析為相關 XAML 命名空間中的支援型別。The XAML types that are specified in the source XAML must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 比方說，WPF 命名空間的 XAML 型別可以解析 XAML; 中所指定的 WPF XAML 命名空間wpf 組件必須包含在專案中或可執行的時間;等等。For example, XAML types for WPF namespaces can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or available in the run time; and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不是建議的 XAML 讀取或 XAML 撰寫的 API 集，如果您要處理[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]型別或根據[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] types, or types based on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用方式，使用讀取或載入 XAML; 和以寫入回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML; and for writing back XAML. 這些類別會使用實作; 在內部 Api 不過，它們也提供支援 WPF 特有影響 XAML 讀取和寫入，例如相依性屬性的最佳化性質的概念。These classes use APIs internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support for WPF-specific concepts that influence the nature of XAML reading and writing, such as optimizations for dependency properties.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對不同的簽章方法指定不同類型的來源 XAML 輸入。Different signatures for the method specify different types of input for the source XAML. 內部的實作會先建立藉由呼叫，然後建立特殊的新執行個體，處理輸入。The internal implementation first creates an by calling and then creates a new instance of a specialized that processes the input. 為了讓呼叫已成功建立物件圖形時，下列必須為真：In order for the call to successfully create an object graph, the following must be true: - 來源是語式正確且有效的 XML。The source is well-formed and valid XML. - 來源是有效的 XAML 語言層級。The source is valid XAML at the language level. - 在來源中指定的 XAML 型別 XAML 必須解析為相關 XAML 命名空間中的支援型別。The XAML types that are specified in the source XAML must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 比方說，WPF 命名空間的 XAML 型別可以解析 XAML; 中所指定的 WPF XAML 命名空間WPF 的組件必須包含在專案中，或可執行的時間;等等。For example, XAML types for WPF namespaces can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or be available in the run time; and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓呼叫已成功建立物件樹狀結構時，下列必須為真：In order for the call to successfully create an object tree, the following must be true: - `xaml`輸入的格式正確且有效的 XML。The `xaml` input is well-formed and valid XML. - `xaml`輸入是有效的 XAML 語言層級。The `xaml` input is valid XAML at the language level. - 中指定的 XAML 型別`xaml`輸入必須解析成支援相關的 XAML 命名空間中的型別。The XAML types that are specified in the `xaml` input must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 比方說，WPF 命名空間的 XAML 型別可以解析 XAML; 中所指定的 WPF XAML 命名空間WPF 的組件必須包含在專案中，或可執行的時間;等等。For example, XAML types for a WPF namespace can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or be available in the run time; and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不是建議的 XAML 讀取或 XAML 撰寫的 API 集，如果您要處理[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]型別或根據[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] types, or types based on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用方式，使用讀取或載入 XAML，和以寫入回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML, and for writing back XAML. 這些類別會使用實作; 在內部 Api 不過，它們也提供支援 WPF 特有影響 XAML 讀取和寫入，例如相依性屬性的最佳化性質的概念。These classes use APIs internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support for WPF-specific concepts that influence the nature of XAML reading and writing, such as optimizations for dependency properties.
